alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bonner, northeastern Stevens and northern Pend Oreille Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 113 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles northeast of Colville to 10 miles northwest of Nordman. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Noisy Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
